name: ACPX Runtime
description: ACP runtime backend powered by the acpx CLI.

command.label: acpx Command
command.help: CLI command used to invoke acpx (default: plugin-local acpx binary, fallback: acpx on PATH).

commandArgs.label: acpx Command Args
commandArgs.help: Extra leading args for the acpx command.

cwd.label: Default Working Directory
cwd.help: Default cwd for ACP session operations when not set per session.

permissionMode.label: Permission Mode
permissionMode.help: Default acpx permission policy for runtime prompts.

nonInteractivePermissions.label: Non-Interactive Permission Policy
nonInteractivePermissions.help: acpx policy when interactive permission prompts are unavailable.

timeoutSeconds.label: Prompt Timeout Seconds
timeoutSeconds.help: Optional acpx timeout for each runtime turn.
